text:
The management and control of the Retirement System shall be vested in the Retirement Board as provided in Section 
12.100 of the Charter. The Board shall exercise the powers and perform the duties conferred on it by the Charter and by other sections of this Code, and in addition thereto as set forth in Sections 
16.37-1 through 
16.37-7. 
(Amended by Ord. 299-64, App. 11/9/64; Ord. 326-00, File No. 001921, App. 12/28/2000)

heading.catch_text: POWERS AND DUTIES GENERALLY OF RETIREMENT BOARD.
